text: Monstrous Ranged Cavalry
Melee Mage Infantry
Spears of Orion

Among the many hunter families loyal to the Forest King, the Spears of Orion is one of the largest. For millennia, they have been the vanguard of Orion's Wild Hunt and the last line of defense for the sacred Oak of Ages each winter.
If Orion calls upon them, these warriors will not hesitate to face sharp blades and magic in defense of their king.
Talsyn Hawks

As the Glade Lord of Talsyn, Araloth wholeheartedly supported Ariel's rise to become the Queen of Athel Loren. Unlike other Elves in the Eternal Queenâ€™s army, they remained steadfast in their faith, unshaken even by fighting their kin, for their loyalty to Ariel was as strong as their faith in their lord.
The blades of this unit have tasted the blood of the long-standing enemies, the Beastmen.
Durthu's Wargrove
Durthu awakened other ancient Treemen who once fought beside him in ancient times. They now join the army of Treekin as lieutenants. Such a grand force has not been seen for centuries.
Warriors who once fought alongside Durthu now return to the forests of Athel Loren.
Durthu's Wargrove (Treekin)
Great Stag Rangers
A group of female Great Stag Riders, skilled at using their archery to harass and disrupt surrounding enemies.
Twilight Guard

The Twilight Guard is a personal bodyguard of the Twilight Sisters, chosen from among the archers who serve the Twilight Sisters in the forests of Athel Loren. Some of the maidens have been blessed with animal affinities through Naestra's training, while others, trained by Arahan, have become cold and ruthless.
A force of gentle yet ruthless maidens, they continually carry out the commands of the Twilight Sisters throughout Athel Loren.
War Druids
It is rumored that some warriors in the Athel Loren forests can transform into animals. They are often seen in the form of various beasts, and they know all that occurs in the woods.
Druids can cast spells in their human form when necessary, and in their animal form, they tear through enemy lines.
War Druids (Beast)
Treeman Hunters
In the forest, Treemen are not only a resilient line of defense but also ruthless hunters. They silently wait for prey in the woods, using bows made from branches and arrows blessed by the Everqueen.
Some Treemen in the forest have learned how to use offensive techniques, and their magic-infused arrows can pierce even the toughest armor.
Malevolent Treeman Hunters
Treemen corrupted by Drycha have a deep hatred for all things. They fear no enemy, using specially enchanted arrows to pierce through the bodies of their foes time and again.
Treemen driven by hatred and bitterness, their arrows can ignite with flames while weakening the armor of enemies.
